ygData.subject: bath robes **small spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: I m wearing the Gossimer Robes now.  You get it off an NPC (I forget his name sorry...Thurmageist or something like that) in the bottom level of Befallen.  In
ygData.messageBody:
I'm wearing the Gossimer Robes now. You get it off an NPC (I forget his
name sorry...Thurmageist or something like that) in the bottom level of
Befallen. In a strong group of 16 you should be able to stick it out down
there fine. (if you've never been in Befallen before...be prepared to die a
couple times till you've gotten used to using keys)

I think you can get the "dusty white robes" there too...oh...and the Damask
robe (that's kinda crap though)

-- Lim'Dul

>Message: 22
Date: Wed, 2 Jun 1999 15:28:10 -0500
From: "Jessie Wildes" <jwildes@...>
>Subject: Re: bath robes

>okay...when am I gonna get one of those cool bath robes?! I thought I was
>being really cool by traveling all the way to Freeport (got sea sick) and
>searched for the ever elusive "gossamer robe". All I found was a violet SR.
>apprentice robe. By the time I got back to my beloved Felwithe...I was
>passe'. Everywhere I looked...everyone had one! :P

Roushia of Bertoxxulous
